author: Gary J. Milne
releaseNotes:
Package-159: Updates AttrMon and ActMon to 1.4.7
Updates to Rooms.
Package-157: Adds %deviceID% variable to Grid to enable control actions.
Package-156: Corrects error in Grid Keyword handling.
Package-155: Corrects error with rows when switching Layout Mode. Handles null conditions arising from user selecting 'No Selection' for critical values.
Package-154: Corrects error with highlightValues() in AM/AM introduces in v1.4.4 
Package-153: Adds additional error handling and logging to the Grid attribute subscription process.
Package-152: Fixes issue in Grid with incomplete subscriptions in Device Group mode.
Package-151: Corrections to package names for AM and MAM. Split %lastEvent% into %lastEvent% and %lastEventValue% in Grid.
Package-150: Fixed typo in line 969 causing error.
Package-149: Improve null handling for AM. Various minor fixes for Grid.
Package-148: Adds support for Tile Builder Grid.
Package-147: Brings Activity and Attribute Monitor to feature parity (V1.4.3) with MAM (V1.2.1). Package-146: Increments MAM to 1.2.1 for multiple improvements.
Package-145: Increments Rooms to 1.1.2 to improve Null handling.
Package-144: Increments MAM to 1.2.0 to add additional rows.
Package-V143: Increments MAM to 1.1.3 to add %time1% and %time2% macros.

apps.name: Tile Builder - Rooms
apps.releaseNotes: Version 1.1.3: Adds a variety of text string options to the list of available Icons. Such as Off, On, Wet, Dry...etc.
